entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidOperationException from AbstractMoveStaticMembersRefactoringProvider.ComputeRefactoringsAsync #64012
  • It looks like ```RefEscapeScope``` is incorrectly calculated for a scoped local inside an explicit block. #64009
    17.4
  • Sometimes a block of comment is not collapsable #64001
    Backlog

Closed

  • IConversionOperation.IsChecked is not true from within checked statement #63951
  • [release/7.0] Unhandled exception. System.NotImplementedException: The method or operation is not implemented. #63940
  • Deprecate `Microsoft.Net.Compilers` on NuGet #63973
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32914.139 #64018
  • Global option to disable format on paste #63955
  • Navigate selected symbol's usage in current file using "Next"/"Previous" buttons (VisualAssistX feature) #63953
  • CS0657 diagnostic suppressor is not reflected in IDE/errors (but it is in build output) #63923
  • Option to make using directive global. #63956
  • Error list is stuck #63394
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32913.307 #64002

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix automation names and keyboard navigation for stack trace explorer #64028
    Area-IDE
  • Return scoped diagnostic #64027
    Area-Compilers
  • Rename SymbolCompletionProvider to RecommendationServiceBasedCompletionProvider #64026
    Area-IDE
  • Fix EnC test and assertion #64025
    Area-Interactive
  • Small cleanup of symbol completion providers #64024
    Area-IDE
  • Support collapsing multi-line comments in any context #64023
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - interface snippet #64022
    Area-IDE
  • Do not report an error and eat `scoped` identifier following `ref` keyword. #64021
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Ignore ref-safe-to-escape of unscoped ref to ref struct in MAMM #64017
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic Snippets - struct + a lot of abstracting #64016
    Area-IDE
  • Use helpers to consistently navigate to symbols in features. #64014
    Area-IDE
  • Check generic containing attribute types #64006
    Area-Compilers
  • Move test method to test code #64005
    Area-IDE
  • Add `ILocalSymbol.IsForEach` and `IsUsing` #64004
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix CodeLens with top level functions #63999
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify project cache cleanup #63995
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64019
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add EA extensibility point to allow go-to-def to navigate to F# source symbols. #64010
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64020
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add a separate scouting integration CI yml #63877
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add theming service and VS implementation #63990
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Require diagnostics to have a location and for that location to have a filepath. #63988
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix generator error on command line (#63347) #64011
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64013
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix Equals override for CompilerDiagnostic reported by CompilerDiagnosticAnalyzer #63937
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use ScopedTypeSyntax in LocalDeclarationStatementSyntax #63962
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64008
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix feedback reply template text #64007
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Change the container of Inheritance margin #63992
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64003
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63996
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63997
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #63998
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1993724 #63994
  • Add `MatchPriority.Deprioritize` and tweak item selection #63985
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor RunTests #63948
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat
  • Emit [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute for all modules compiled with updated escape rules #63916
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Allow adding `scoped` or removing `[UnscopedRef]` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #63656
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Don't request frozen partial document for semantic tokens in proc #63984
    Area-IDE
  • Use real data type for diagnostic location information #63946
    Area-IDE
  • Cache results of reading SOurceText in SerializableSourceText #63980
    Area-IDE
  • Disable quickinfo on new inline rename #63907
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Semantic snippets - Turn on experiment + turn off old snippets while new snippet experience is on #63991
    Area-IDE
  • Update Csc.cs #63976
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63796
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Replace Razor Source Generator reference with one loaded from a VSIX #63912
    Area-IDE
  • Report static parameter type error (CS0721) on parameter type instead of method name #63975
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Disable flakey integration tests" #62542
    Area-IDE
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update DefiniteAssignment Pass to Account for Local Default Parameter Values #63850
    Area-Compilers
